question:
Which among the following statements is/are correct about the world population?
  1. The 10 most populous countries of the world contribute about 60 per cent to the world’s population.
  2. Roughly, 90 per cent of the world population lives in about 10 per cent of its land area.
Select the correct code from the options given below:
explanation: Roughly, 90 per cent of the world population lives in about 10 per cent of its land area. The 10 most populous countries of the world contribute about 60 per cent to the world’s population. Out of the top ten most populous countries, 6 are located in Asia. China is the most populous country of the world followed by India, the USA, Indonesia, Brazil, Pakistan, Bangladesh, Nigeria, Russian Federation, and Japan
